author: Special Correspondent
text:
Congress president Sonia Gandhi’s daughter Priyanka Gandhi on Monday made a surprise visit to Puducherry to see her daughter Miraya Vadra play basketball in a national-level tournament at Indira Gandhi Sports Complex here. After landing at Chennai airport, she reached here by road and is staying at a hotel near the Beach Promenade, police said.

Priyanka's daughter Miraya has been representing her school at the sub-junior basketball national competition, scheduled to commence on Tuesday.

As many as 42 teams are expected to participate in the tournament at the Rajiv Gandhi Indoor Stadium situated inside Indira Gandhi Sports Complex, Uppalam.
title: Priyanka Gandhi in Puducherry
